segments.advisor_message: So, to start off, you mentioned that, uhm, you're lookin' to save for your kids' education and also to, like, plan for retirement, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, exactly! I really wanna set aside some money for their college and make sure I have enough for when I retire too. It's super important for me.

segments.advisor_message: And, you also brought up that you're thinking about maybe starting a side business, is that correct?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! I've been, uh, toying with the idea of a small online store or something. Just, like, something that can earn a bit of extra cash on the side.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So education, retirement, and the business. Is there anything else you'd like to add, or those are your main goals?
segments.client_message: No, that pretty much sums it up, I guess. Just wanna make sure I'm on the right track, you know.
